Description: Enable generator with event number to be pushed into encoder
Select external Event (NIM IN1) when '1', else internal event signal generator
Select external Gate (NIM IN0) when '1', else internal gate signal generator
Enable gate generator with selected GateType to be pushed into encoder (OR with Gate Open bit)
Open the gate when '1', close it when '0' (OR with Gate Generator)
Gate Type 0 closed, 1 beam,2 cosmics, 3 LED
